author: The Spectator - Graeme Thomson
title: Why Easter is the most rock and roll religious holiday | Flipboard
text: Why Easter is the most rock and roll religious holiday Easter is by far the most rock and roll religious holiday. Christmas might be the time when the pop vultures circle, plucking from the bones of garish sentiment, but the wham-bam narrative mic-drops of Holy Week are of a different order.
